scoringPlays.text: Austin Wolf 24 Yd pass from Thomas Woodson (Tom O'Leary Kick)
Deltron Sands 32 Yd Run (Tom O'Leary Kick)
Kwadarrius Smith 21 Yd pass from Thomas Woodson (Tom O'Leary Kick)
John Lako 35 Yd Interception Return (Tom O'Leary Kick)

videos.headline: Akron's Woodson finds Wolf for TD
videos.description: Thomas Woodson connects with Austin Wolf for a 24-yard touchdown pass in the first quarter.

videos.headline: Akron's defense gets big goal line stand
videos.description: Ball State running back Caleb Huntley is stopped cold at the 1-yard line and the Zips take over on downs.

videos.headline: Akron WR makes pretty sideline grab
videos.description: Kwadarrius Smith makes a beautiful catch down the sideline to put the Zips in field goal range.

videos.headline: Woodson throws perfect pass for TD
videos.description: Zips quarterback  Thomas Woodson throws a 21-yard strike to  Kwadarrius Smith for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Zips defense intercepts Milas
videos.description: Ball State quarterback Jack Milas is picked off by Darian Bailey setting up the Zips with good field position.

videos.headline: Akron pick 6 adds to lead
videos.description: Linebacker John Lako takes the interception to the house as the Zips pour it on in the fourth quarter.
